item.description: I was in a flashmob group and we lost our organizer, so I'm trying to see if any of my other meetup groups would be interested in doing a flashmob in October 27th in Salem, MA to "We are young" I would like everyone to dress elderly; if you are elderly, awesome!! I will likely incorporate some partnered moves (so find a partner please) but it will be easy enough for the non-dancer to do and will complete the choreography some time this summer and post the video of the dance so people can practice at home. For anyone interested, I can also host some practice sessions before hand for anyone interested at YogaOne in Seekonk, where I teach yoga.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: FlashMob to "We are young" in Salem and in costume
